name: Lamplighters
description:
Follow our updates on Twitter!

You are Klieg, a robot with a takeout box for a head! He wields a streetlight as a weapon and takes on bigger robots! Those big robots launch music notes as projectiles that Klieg must parry and dodge! In a perfect world, we'd tell you the story where this all makes sense somehow! But for now, this is a prototype where you can enjoy kicking robot butt and enjoying some banger tunes!

Rack up combos and unleash charge attacks to defeat your enemy in this rhythm/action game crossover inspired by DJMax, Dark Souls, and Beat Saber!
